title: Dosa Tak Terampun
overview: The story of Junaidah, a village seamstress haunted by her sins, including disobeying her mother, Jamaliah, and conceiving an illegitimate child, Jufri. Junaidah lives in regret and schizophrenia due to her past immoralities, while Jufri becomes a violent drug addict. Eventually, a tragedy unfolds, revealing Junaidah's true identity.
